title: Bike Sharing(Feature Engineering)
description: Bike SharingOn this notebook, we will try to predict number of total rental using machine learning algorithms. Before this one, we will do feature engineering and exploratory data analysis for examine the data. Let's explore the data.  datetime - hourly date + timestamp   season -  1 = spring, 2 = summer, 3 = fall, 4 = winter  holiday - whether the day is considered a holiday workingday - whether the day is neither a weekend nor holiday weather - 1: Clear, Few clouds, Partly cloudy, Partly cloudy  2: Mist + Cloudy, Mist + Broken clouds, Mist + Few clouds, Mist  3: Light Snow, Light Rain + Thunderstorm + Scattered clouds, Light Rain + Scattered clouds  4: Heavy Rain + Ice Pallets + Thunderstorm + Mist, Snow + Fog  temp - temperature in Celsius atemp - "feels like" temperature in Celsius humidity - relative humidity windspeed - wind speed casual - number of non-registered user rentals initiated registered - number of registered user rentals initiated count - number of total rentals
